description.value: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system to represent the outcome of a physical examination of the testes.

display.value: Newborn and Infant Physical Examination Screening Programme, testis examination incomplete
Newborn and Infant Physical Examination Screening Programme, testis examination declined
Newborn and Infant Physical Examination Screening Programme, testis examination not done
Newborn and Infant Physical Examination Screening Programme, testis examination done, no abnormality
Newborn and Infant Physical Examination Screening Programme, testis examination done, bilateral abnormality suspected
Newborn and Infant Physical Examination Screening Programme, testis examination done, left abnormality suspected
Newborn and Infant Physical Examination Screening Programme, testis examination done, right abnormality suspected
